name: Pistachio hair bow
description:
Hand-sewn (no hot glue!) hair bow in pistachio green. It's made from grosgrain ribbon, so it keeps it's shape quite well. This bow looks particularly good at the top of a braid.

While this is intended for use in hair, it also looks wonderful on a wrapped package! Instead of putting ribbon that can't be reused, simply clip this onto the gift card or other package decorations, or use it to clip closed a gift bag. The present starts before they even get it open!

Attaches easily with a single-prong alligator clip. measures approximately 3.5 inches horizontally and 2.5 inches vertically. These are all hand made, so some minor variations may occur.

name: White Delicate Hair Bow
description:
Hand-sewn (no hot glue!) hair bow made from a textured white ribbon. The center of the ribbon is satin, and the edges are sheer, making this a lovely, delicate bow. It brings to mind Easter and Christmas, and the mad dash out the door with shoes in hand and a hair clip tucked into a shoe, to be put on in the car, so we can get to grandma's house on time. 

While this is intended for use in hair, it also looks wonderful on a wrapped package! Instead of putting ribbon that can't be reused, simply clip this onto the gift card or other package decorations, or use it to clip closed a gift bag. The present starts before they even get it open!

Attaches easily with a single-prong alligator clip. measures approximately 3.5 inches horizontally and 2.5 inches vertically. These are all hand made, so some minor variations may occur.

name: Aqua Dot Hair Bow
description:
hand-sewn aqua and white hair bow. The white polka dots have a bit of glitter in them, making this bow sparkle! Attaches easily with a single-prong alligator clip. 

While intended for use in hair, this bow also looks cute on the outside of a gift! Instead of using ribbon that will be thrown away, clip this onto your package or card, the presents start before they even open the package!

measures approximately 3.5 inches horizontally and 2.5 inches vertically.

name: Rainbow stripe hair bow
description:
Hand-sewn (no hot glue!) hair bow with rainbow colored horizontal stripes. The white parts of the bow make this a bright and cheerful addition to many outfits! It makes me think of Rainbowdash, from My Little Pony. It's a wonderful splash of color that goes with a surprising number of outfits.

While this is intended for use in hair, it also looks wonderful on a wrapped package! Instead of putting ribbon that can't be reused, simply clip this onto the gift card or other package decorations, or use it to clip closed a gift bag. The present starts before they even get it open!

Attaches easily with a single-prong alligator clip. measures approximately 3.5 inches horizontally and 2.5 inches vertically. These are all hand made, so some minor variations may occur.
